tagline: A Simple API for Writing Portable Code for Accelerators
body:
### About

Geryon is a simple C++ library intended to simplify device and memory management, I/O, and timing for the CUDA and OpenCL APIs. Additionally, it provides a single interface to the CUDA-Driver, CUDA-Runtime, and OpenCL APIs to allow a single code to compile using any of the 3 APIs.

The Geryon source code, tools and examples can be found here:

[http://github.com/scicomp/geryon](http://github.com/scicomp/geryon)

API documentation can be found here:

[http://scicomp.github.com/geryon/api](http://scicomp.github.com/geryon/api)
